```{r refs, echo=FALSE, results="asis",message=F}

library(RefManageR)
BibOptions(check.entries = FALSE,
           bib.style = "authoryear",
           #cite.style = "alphabetic",
           style = "markdown",
           hyperlink = FALSE,
           dashed = FALSE
           )

Bib <- ReadBib("Bib.bib", check = F)
NoCite(Bib,"*")
PrintBibliography(Bib,start =1)
```
